Hotel.name: The Trafalgar St. James, London Curio Collection By Hilton

Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The Trafalgar Hotel places you in the heart of London, steps from Admiralty Arch and Trafalgar Square. This 4-star hotel is close to Big Ben and King's College London.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 129 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and DVD players. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a fitness center or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in London? This hotel features 506 square feet (47 square meters) of event facilities.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Full breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 22.6 km / 14 mi

The preferred airport for The Trafalgar Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

London (LHR-Heathrow) - 22.6 km / 14.1 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 39.1 km / 24.3 mi

Message.Text: Note: From September 12th, the main entrance to the hotel will change from Spring Gardens to Pall Mall and the new reception pods will be moved into Rockwell Bar. There will be no access to the hotel gym from August 30th, but guests can enjoy free access to the fitness centre at the Strand Palace Hotel (Monday – Sunday 6.30am – 10.00pm) which is just a short walk from The Trafalgar.
